name: Super Share
author: Shrinivas Naik

sections.description:
Super Share wordpress social plugin by MasterBlogster shows the social sharing buttons in a popup box only when reader reaches the end of the article. It also contains a Feedburner subscription form.

Here is the live demo of Master Blogster Super Share plugin

Plugin homepage: http://masterblogster.com/plugins/super-share-wordpress-plugin

[It is highly recommended to update the plugin to the latest version i.e. 1.1]
sections.installation: Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Fixed Facebook like button issue in Mozilla Firefox and Internet Explorer browsers
